about_the_game:
Vice: Magic City Mayhem - A Zelda-like set in a chaotic GTA: Vice City-inspired world!

You play as Dutch, one of Magic City’s top enforcers off on a quest to save your one true love, Sophie. Make your way through bustling nightclubs, scenic beaches, and raptor-infested yachts on a raunchy adventure to save the day!

Features:

  • 2D hack-n-slash combat (with ranged elements)

  • Epic and dynamic boss fights

  • Exploration with environmental secrets

  • Item and weapon upgrade system

  • Unique dungeons with engaging puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1st gen i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 series or AMD equivalent graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2nd gen Intel i7 or Ryzen equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • Storage: 3 GB available space
